document.full_text: with just a few hours to go before the masters gets under way at augusta national, the growing sense of anticipation for the season's first major has reached fever pitch because of its rich promise.
document.title: mickelson a slight favorite in "wide open" masters
lines_and_colors: with just a few hours to go before the masters gets under way at augusta national, the growing sense of anticipation for the season's first major has reached fever pitch because of its rich promise.
